name: cdn-route
description: Custom domains, CDN caching, and TLS certificates with automatic renewal

metadata.longDescription: Content Distribution Network (CDN) is a geographically distributed network of proxy servers and their data centers. The goal is to provide high availability and high performance by distributing the service spatially relative to end-users.

plans.name: cdn-route
plans.description: Custom domains, CDN caching, and TLS certificates with automatic renewal
